channel.title: Client Question
channel.description:
I've made a new client for myself (still in development).
I have a minor question.
-- When i made my client, i made it so a window popped up for the server ip. But its came to be annoying, and i don't want people leeching my client.
-I want to take away the popup for the server ip, and make it so you can't see the server ip. e.g.
Username: Password: -No server ip here-
but, i want it so the client reads my server ip, and not showing the ip line.

item.title: Client Question
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Remove it from the Gui class, and make the string read your Server’s IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Question
item.dc:creator: @Vendetta_LG Vendetta_LG
item.description:
@Vendetta_LG wrote:

I’ve made a new client for myself (still in development).

I have a minor question.

–
When i made my client, i made it so a window popped up for the server ip.
But its came to be annoying, and i don’t want people leeching my client.

e.g.

Password:
-No server ip here-

but, i want it so the client reads my server ip, and not showing the ip line.
